item.title: Get the names of valid color palettes
item.description: get_milestone_palette_names.Rd Get the names of valid color palettes milestone_palette(name, n) get_milestone_palette_names() Arguments name The name of the palette. Must be one of "cubeHelix", "Set3", or "rainbow". n The number of colours to be in the palette. Contents Arguments --
